Uses of Class
exception.MastermindIllegalLengthException

  • Packages that use MastermindIllegalLengthException 
    Package Description
    controller  
    model  

    • Uses of MastermindIllegalLengthException in controller

      Methods in controller that throw MastermindIllegalLengthException 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int MastermindController.getRightColorRightPlace​(java.lang.String guess)
      This method takes in a string and compares it to the solution, then it counts and returns the number of letters that are the right color in the right places
      int MastermindController.getRightColorWrongPlace​(java.lang.String guess)
      This method takes in a string and compares it to the solution, then it counts and returns the number of letters that are the right colors but are in the wrong places
      boolean MastermindController.isCorrect​(java.lang.String guess)
      This method takes in a string and compares it to the solution, then it returns true if the guess matches the solution and false if it doesn't

    • Uses of MastermindIllegalLengthException in model

      Constructors in model that throw MastermindIllegalLengthException 
      Constructor Description
      MastermindModel​(java.lang.String answer)
      This method is a special constructor to allow us to use JUnit to test our model.
